name: Bulgur Wheat Salad
description: Fresh herbs, lemon dressing, and hearty bulgur.

recipeInstructions.text: Soak bulgur in boiling water for 10 minutes until tender.
Drain excess water and fluff with a fork.
Mix with chopped parsley, mint, and diced cucumber.
Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice.
Toss well and chill before serving.

keywords: bulgur salad, Mediterranean salad, healthy grain salad
